thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Paris-St. Germain Des Pres - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and courteous staff
thread.title_full: Great location and courteous staff - Review of Holiday Inn Paris-St. Germain Des Pres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: J B
title: Great location and courteous staff
text:
Very well situated if you like to walk and or take public transportation. Noisy and small rooms with a weird opening window system. Expensive bar. Will stay there again but will ask for a different room.
Room Tip: Close to good shopping and very French neighborhood. See more room tips
